original_text: saying, ‘If we had lived in the days of our fathers, we would not have taken part with them in shedding the blood of the prophets.’
korean_text: 만일 우리가 조상 때에 있었더라면 우리는 그들이 선지자의 피를 흘리는 데 참여하지 아니하였으리라 하니

sentences.original_text: If we had lived in the days of our fathers,
sentences.korean_translation: 만일 우리가 우리 조상의 때에 살았더라면,

sentences.original_text: we would not have taken part with them
in shedding the blood of the prophets.’
